    • Method Detail

      • getTargetBioactivities

        ChemblBioactivities getTargetBioactivities(String targetId)
                                           throws ChemblAdapterException
        Gets bioactivities for a given target.
        Parameters:
        targetId - the ChEMBL ID of the target.
        Returns:
        the reported bioactivities for the target.
        Throws:
        ChemblAdapterException

      • getCompoundBioactivities

        ChemblBioactivities getCompoundBioactivities(String compoundId)
                                             throws ChemblAdapterException
        Gets bioactivities for a given compound.
        Parameters:
        compoundId - the ChEMBL ID of the compound.
        Returns:
        the reported bioactivities for the compound.
        Throws:
        ChemblAdapterException

      • getPreferredName

        String getPreferredName(String compoundId)
                        throws ChemblAdapterException
        Gets the preferred name for a given compound, if available.
        Parameters:
        compoundId - the ChEMBL ID of the compound.
        Returns:
        a name, or null if none available.
        Throws:
        ChemblAdapterException

        Changes the configuration.
        Parameters:
        config - the new configuration
